summary: How does NRC calculate its fees? The Nuclear Regulatory Commission collects about 90 percent of its budget by charging fees to its licensees and applicants, such as nuclear power plant operators. However, we found that NRC’s fee calculations were complex and not well explained, which made it difficult for industry stakeholders to understand or comment on them. title: Nuclear Regulatory Commission: Regulatory Fee-Setting Calculations Need Greater Transparency
